data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I want to create a calendar consisted of Date::Simple objects. I
    search module to do such a thing and find Time::Piece::Month, a
    month of Time::Piece objects. But I couldn't find not Time::Piece
    but Date::Simple. So I write a module that represent a month
    consisted of Date::Simple. I named this module Date::Simple::Month.
